segments.text: Where are you going to play this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have not given it much thought . Do you have any good suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to spend two days in the mountains with friends . The city is too noisy . Do you know Tangle Temple ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been there . It is in the middle of the mountains . It is not noisy there and you have to be a vegetarian .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to climb the mountain with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . The temple is quite large .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many ancient pine trees there . It is especially quiet at night . It is wonderful to listen to the monks chanting while listening to the soothing sound of the winds in the pine trees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm getting a little excited now . What clothes should I wear ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take some thick clothes with you . It is rather cold there at night . If you wear the T-shirt you're wearing now , you will become a ' popsicle ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like taking pictures , you may bring a camera with you .
segments.speaker: S2
